text: Ludorf is a German language habitational surname denoting a person originally living in Ludorf (place name from a personal name with the element liut "people", "tribe" and Dorf "village") and may refer to: *Henry F. Ludorf (1888–1968), American architect *Julius Ludorf (1919–2015), German footballer == References == Category:German-language surnames
title: Ludorf (surname)
